summary: A man lives a poor lifestyle in a small town with his older brothers. He is unemployed and commits himself to be a wrestler, but he has to promise to be celibate until he is 40 years old.
cast: Anil Kapoor|Amrita Singh|Om Prakash|Amjad Khan|Pankaj Kapur|Annu Kapoor|Bharti Achrekar|Satyendra Kapoor|Ram P. Sethi|Tabassum|Nandita Thakur|Huma Khan|Ghanshyam Rohera|Shail Chaturvedi|Jinder Walia|Dilip Mukherjee|Raaj Anand|Ravi Jhankal|Suresh Chauhan|Karthik|Raghuveer|Subroto Mahapatra|Anthony Joseph|Bhupendra|Deepak Seth|Ram|Munna|Rashid Mehta|Jabbar Khan|Ravi Shinde|Harbans Darshan M. Arora|Roobini|Jayshree T.
title: Chameli Ki Shaadi
